div.p:
Â
Welcome to Snyder Public Schools, home of The Cyclones!!!Â It is both an honor and privilege to serve this great school system and community.Â Our goal is simple:Â Always Put Kids FIRST and prepare each student to be a lifelong learner.Â
Our staff of highly qualified professional educators and support personnel is committed to providing our students with a variety of opportunities both inside and . . .
